pkgmetadata.longdescription: Metatype========Implements the base metaformat types for different versions ofmetaformat.This package provides classes derived from base ``dict`` class, withmodified constructors, in order to validate represent data itemsfollowing metaformatâ€™s specific version (specific metaformats).It is organized as follows::: metatype metatype mft <N> rfc <N> iso <N>
